bioAsHtml: Worldwide manager of the Devoxx4Kids initiative, co-organizer of Devoxx4Kids Events in Belgium, Steering Member of Devoxx BE, Steering Member of BeJUG , Architect and Java SE/EE enthusiast and Freelance
